job_description: Purpose and ExpectationsWe are looking for an experienced Visual UX designer to help define the product visual identity for SAP Business Objects products.  Collaborating closely with UX Design and Solution Management, the Visual Designer supports development projects by delivering graphical assets and detailed design specifications for the target UI technology to enable the implementation of the product visual identity.SAP BusinessObjects business intelligence (BI) solutions provide comprehensive business intelligence functionality that empowers users to make effective, informed decisions based on solid data and analysis. All users, from the high-end analyst to the casual business user, have access to the information they need -with minimal dependence on IT resources and developers. With these powerful solutions, users throughout the enterprise can access, format, analyze, navigate, and share information across the organization.  http://www.sap.com/pc/analytics/business-intelligence.htmlExpectations and TasksWork closely with interaction designers and other stakeholders to achieve visual design goals.Ability to design to and evolve an existing  visual UI standardComfortable defining and implementing web based grid frameworksScreen layout design including spacing and positioning of design elementsFamiliar with writing and implementing CSS designs   Design and delivery of visual assets including icons and interactive controlsDesign of color palettes for content elements such as charts and graphs.
